1.content: Alright first thing's first, what genre of game do you want write or read about?
1.title: The beginning

111.content: Okay we're almost to the fun part! Which Kingdom Hearts character gets diapered?
111.title: Kingdom Hearts

1111.content: Why does Sora get diapered?
1111.title: Sora

choices: In birth by sleep(when he was 4)
11112.content: Last question, during which game does this take place?
11112.title: Needs them

111121.content: Sora had trouble with the potty. Either he didn't notice he had to go, or he couldn't hold it long enough to get to the potty. That's why he wore diapers all the time. Pull ups didn't hold enough, and he hardly made it anyway. Diapers were comfier too, they were nice and soft. Where was Sora?
111121.title: In birth by sleep(when he was 4)

1111211.content: "Another accident, buddy?" Sora's dad, Chocobo(though he insisted people call him Chris) asked seeing his boy walking to him embarassed. "Yeah, sorry daddy." Sora replied looking down at his feet. Normally it was his Mommy that took care of these sinfs, but she wasn't feeling good, so his daddy took the day off from work. "Don't be, Sora. It's just an accident. Why don't you take a break from potty training." He comforted giving his son a pat on the head. "Whaddya mean?" Sora asked looking up in curiosity. "I mean, don't worry about the potty for awhile. Next time you gotta go pee or poop, just go in your diaper. You just have to tell me or a big kid if you have an accident, so we can get you in a clean diaper." He explained patiently. "Okay Daddy, but does Riku count as a big boy?" Chris thought for a moment on his son's question before replying...
1111211.title: At home

11112111.content:
""I gues so." Chris replied after some consideration. Riku was completely potty trained after all, and he was pretty mature for his age. "Cool, I'm gonna go play!" Sora said running off to the islands. "Wait a sec, you silly goose!" Chris ordered chuckling and pulled him into his lap. "I gotta change your diaper." He explained at Sora's suprised look. "Oh!" He replied nodding in understanding.

Chris chuckled once more before picking his son up. He carried him to his room and lied him on his bed. He grabbed a diaper, plastic pants, and some wipes from on top the dresser and went to work changing him. "Sora remember, tell me, or a big kid, when you have an accident. I don't want you to spend all day playing in a wet or poppy diaper." He warned sternly. "Okay, Daddy!" Sora agreed eaisly. Chris finished up changing Sora and gave the little a backpack filled with diapers and other supplies. Then, the boy ran off to play. He was going to tell Sora that he forgot to put his shirts back on, but he figured it didn't matter. Almost everybody knew Sora still wore diapers, even among his friends. Plus, it was pretty warm out.

Sora made it to the beach, not realizing that all of the adults and some big kids were keeping a close eye on him while he ran to the islands. They didn't want him to get hurt or anything. All of the kids who played in the islands were watched from afar by all the adults.

He giggled as the warm sand went in between his toes. He sat on the ground just to relax and enjoy the nice weather, the plastic pants kept the sand from getting into his diaper, and making it uncomfortable. He soon noticed his two good friends Kairi and Riku playing together. He could go and play with them, but he saw a tall guy with brown hair standing by the water. (Terra) He wanted to see what he was up to. Which did he choose?
11112111.title: Yes

111121112.content:
"Hey Mister!" Sora called out running towards the mysterious man. "Huh, oh hey." The mysterious man greeted kneeling down to Sora's level. "Who're you?" He asked curiosly. "I'm Terra, what's your name?" Terra replied giving the kid a friendly smile. "I'm Sora!" Sora said happily. "So, what're you doing here?" He asked having never seen this guys before. "I'm just thinking about stuff." Terra answered cryptically.

"Sora, do you want to be strong one day?' He asked as he closed his eyes, seemingly sensing something. "Uh huh, I wanna protect my mommy and daddy and all my friends too!" Sora replied earnestly. Terra smiled, summoned a mysterious weapon and recited something he had heard a long time ago "In your hand, take this Key. So long as you have the makings, then through this simple act of taking, its wielder you shall one day be. And you will find me, friend—no ocean will contain you then. No more borders around, or below, or above, so long as you champion the ones you love."

Sora grabbed the weapon and it...
111121112.title: Investigate

111122.content:
Sora wore diapers. Not just because he wanted to, but he had no control over his bladder! He had to wear them or else he'd make a mess everywhere. The only person who knew, besides his mom and dad, was Riku. He was nice enough to not tell Kairi and the others about it, but his slience occasionally came with the price of being treated like a baby once in awhile. It was freaking embarrassing having his friend see him naked, but it'd be more embarassing if his crush found out he wore diapers! Riku was his best friend and a darn good one at that, but he liked to feel in charge. That's why he likes to take care of Sora sometimes.

"Hey, Sora!" Riku called out runnnng towards his friend. "Huh, Yeah Riku?" He asked curiously. "Wanna make a bet?" He asked smirking. "What kinda bet?" He replied having learned the hard way not too accept bets without hearing what they were first. "We fight with our toy swords. If I win, I get to baby you full time and in front of Kairi!" "If I win, you have to stop babying me!" Sora interrupted his friend with a competitive but goofy smile. "So, you accept?" Riku replied with a matching smile. What does Sora say?
111122.title: Kingdom Hearts 1

choices: Stay and baby Sora in his memories
Leave Sora's memories(and poossibly baby him)
1111231.content:
A memory was being observed, by both it's creator and a third party. It was of a little boy lieing on his bed. On his dresser was a stack of diapers, that wans't too suprising, considering the boy was only 5. Plenty of little boys his age had a bed wetting problem. What was surprising, was it was only 9:00 a.m! There was no way any little boy would go to bed this early! That meant, Sora wore diapers during the day too! But, why?


Namine listened in on the conversation between Sora and his mother. "Mom, do I have to wear these?!" He whined, as Mary, his mom, slid the diaper under his rear. "Sweet heart, you've hardly made it to the potty at all this week." She explained not pausing in the process of diapering Sora.

"I'm sorry, I'll do better!" He pleaded desperately "This isn't a punishment Sora, it's just to make sure you don't make a mess." She explained gently and calmly. Finally, she taped the diaper on to her little boy. He looked calmer now, but he was still unhappy.

"Sora, you can still use the potty if you want, but I won't be upset if you decide you just wanna use your diaper." She explained, as Sora pulled on the red jump suit his Dad bought for him last week. It was quickly becoming his favorite outfit, and if Namine was seeing correctly, it was a simply smaller version of the one he wore currently.

"Okay, Mommy." Sora agreed, running off to play. Namine now had a choice to make. Would she alter Sora's memories and add herself to them as a big sister and care taker? She knew the organization wanted Sora to be obessed with her, and she knew they didn't care how she did it. On the other hand, she could leave Sora's memories for now, and find out whether or not, he was still in diapers at age 14.

What was her decision?
1111231.title: Chain of Memories

11112311.content:
Namine saw how cute and innocent Sora was. She wanted nothing more than to play with and take care of that little boy. She followed him towards the beach, where he was playing by himself. Riku and Kairi and the flu, so they couldn't play.

"Hi, Sora!" Namine greeted cheerfully. "Hi, big sister!" He chirped with equal enthusiasm. She had used her powers to make Sora think she was his big sister. "What's with the diaper, little brother?" She asked sitting on the sandand pulling him into her lap. "Mommy's making me wear it, 'cause I've been having accidents." He complained, not resisting as he was pulled into her lap.

"Well look on the bright side, at least now you don't to worry about getting your clothes all yucky. Plus, now you can just go in your diaper whenever you want." Namine reasoned giggling, at Sora's concentrating face. He was either thinking hard about something, or he was pooping. "What'cha doing Sora?" She asked smiling sweetly. "I'm...
11112311.title: Stay and baby Sora in his memories

1113.content: Alright how about these characters?
1113.title: Other

11131.content: Why does Roxas end up in diapers?
11131.title: Roxas

111312.content:
Roxas had an embarrassing secret. He wore diapers. It wasn't by choice. He never had any control of his bladder. There was virtually no point in using the toilet for anything. Considering his diaper would just end up being used anyway. He didn't like it, but he was used to it at this point.

Roxas yawned, sitting up in his bed. He threw off the covers and waddled, in his thick night diaper, to his closet. He untaped the soaked thing and threw it in the trash. He let out a yawn, grabbed a towel then hopped into the shower. He made sure he was throughly clean, before stepping out of the shower. He dried himself off and put himself in a thinner day time diaper.

He had a long night. He blearlingly looked around his room. It took him a second to realize he was in...
111312.title: Needs them

1113122.content:
Of course, he was in his room in Twilight Town. How the heck could he forget where he was?! He must've had one too many bars of sea salt ice cream! He dressed himself in his usual outfit, and stuffed some diapers, along with other supplies, into a backpack. He tossed his secret teddy bear back onto his bed and went out. His teddy was a bit of a guilty pleasure for him, that and his footie pajamas and pacifier.

He had a little side that very, VERY few people knew about. Who knew about it?
1113122.title: Twilight Town

111312213.content:
Of course, his three best friends knew about his little side. Nothing was kept secret between the four of them. They knew and completely accepted that part of him. On days that Roxas was feeling particularly babyish, they'd be his babysitters for the day. They'd change his diapers, give him bottles, and overall just treat him like a baby. It was always a fun thing!

He took his pacifier from his pocket and stuck in his mouth a second before he was about to enter The Usual Spot. He sucked on it happily as he walked, crinkling with every step. "Hey, Roxas." Hayner greeted looking at the obviously diapered teen with a smirk. "Need a babysitter today?" Pence asked chuckling at how adorable Roxas was. Roxas giggled and replied "
111312213.title: All three of them

1113122132.content:
"Uh huh!" Roxas agreed shaking his head up and down. He got a weird look on his face suddenly. Then, he let out a grunt and then a relaxed sigh. It was obvious to Hayner what his friend had done. "Did baby Roxas make a stinky in his diaper?" He cooed chuckling. "Yup, a big one!" Roxas boasted proudly. "I guess, I have to change this stinky baby's diaper!" Hayner said grabbing Roxas's supplies from his bag.

Meanwhile, the other teens just barely kept from laughing. "I can't believe how much fun they're having!" Pence exclaimed, smiling as Hayner began to change Roxas. "It almost makes me forget that Roxas isn't just a little kid. Heck, if I hadn't seen him do it, I'd doubt he could actually change himself!" Olette replied giggling. "Are you sure he isn't just a baby, pretending to be a big kid?" Pence questioned jokingly!

"So Roxas, this what you've been doing?" A man in the shadows asked surprising the teens. "Who the hell are you?!" Roxas exclaimed, getting up immediately after Hayner had taped the diaper on and instinctively summoning his keyblade! "Relax, it's just me...

Who was it?
1113122132.title: "Uh huh!"

11131222.content: Which person from the organization?
11131222.title: Someone from the organization

choices: From Wind Waker and/or it's sequels
1211.content: Okay we're almost done with the questions, I promise. Which young Link is this?
1211.title: Child

12111.content: Why is this Link in diapers?
12111.title: From Wind Waker and/or it's sequels

121111.content:
Link had always liked diapers. He was always looking for an excuse to wear them. His long journey over the seas was the perfect excuse to wear them, because there were no bathrooms. The time to buy them was now, while he had to stop at this small island, called windfall. While he was here, he needed to buy a sail.

He walked around the island and found a short man behind a counter. "How can I help you, young man?" The man asked cordially. "Um, I'm looking for a sail... and some diapers." Link asked fighting back a blush. "Of course!" The man replied placing the items on the counter. "Now normally this would come to around to 200 rupees, but since you're my first customer and because of your night problem, I'll bring it down to 75." The man said cheerfully and winking at Link. Link was confused when he said night problem, but he quickly realized the man thought he was a bedwetter. That was fine with him, the less people that knew the real reason, the better.

Link paid for his stuff then decided to...
121111.title: He likes them

1211111.content:
Link carried his things in a paper bag, so know one would realize what he had bought. He quickly went into a building and hid in the bathroom. He took his pants and boxers off, leaving him naked from the waist down. He took a shuddering breath. Hesitantly, he opened the package of diapers. He took one out, loving the feeling of how soft it was. He smiled at the sweet smell of baby powder. With an excited grin, he unfolded it and held it between his legs. With ease only stemming from lot's of practice, he fastened it so it was snug but not uncomfortably so.

He took just a moment, to truly enjoy it's soft thickness. At the insistence of the people waiting for him to come out of the stall, he put his pants back on and threw his boxers in the bag with the rest of his diapers and the sail. When he came out, did anybody notice his padding?
1211111.title: Put on a diaper

choices: "We must go to dragon roost island!"
12111112.content:
Link walked calmly out of the stall hoping no one noticed his padded butt. Luckily for him, no one paid attention to him, or the crinkles he made with every step. They didn't even notice the slight waddle. He managed to make it back to The King of The Red Lions without incident.

"I see you have brought back what we needed, and also, it seems you brought yourself some special protection!" It exclaimed laughing heartily at Link's suprised expression. "Do not fear, I care very little about your choice in undergarments, and I do not believe it is anyone else's business!" It chuckled attempting to reassure Link. The padded boy let out a sigh of relief before he set up the sail and the boat proclaimed...
12111112.title: No

12112.content: Why is Link in diapers?
12112.title: Ocarina of Tiime/ Majora's Mask

choices: He likes to go to the bathroom in them.
121121.content: Link, even now as a child, loves wearing diapers because...
121121.title: Likes them

choices: I’m pretty hungry, must be time for lunch.
Maybe it’s time to convince Zelda to wear diapers with me.
1211211.content: Young Link smiled as he had his comfy diaper around him. Not only does he like the softness, he doesn’t have to worry about going to the bathroom, because he can just go in his diaper. Plus, he likes to get naughty and stay in the diaper for a few hours, especially if he’s on a journey or in a middle of a battle. He was currently at Zelda’s castle, after having that Majora’s mask adventure, and he is currently playing around with his diaper snugged around his butt. He smiled as he thought...
1211211.title: He likes to go to the bathroom in them.

choices: He leaves notes in her room about how diapers are better than the bathroom.
12112112.content: So how does Young Link exactly get the young Zelda into diapers?
12112112.title: Diapered playmates

121122.content:
Link was desperate. He had defeated the Mask, Incarnation, and the Wrath of the demon Majora. He had travelled through time and space to save the world! In the process, he righted every wrong and saved countless lives! He was the hero of time once more! But the hero, was now trapped, in the world he had saved. The door was shut, he was hopeless.

Dejectedly, he walked towards the Stock Pot. Anju was there at the front desk and gave him a grateful smile. It seemed that she, along with many other residents, remembered what happened. "Link, I'm suprised you haven't gone home. You're mother and father must be worried sick!" She said concernedly. "It's alright, my parents...aren't around anymore." He excused putting up a neutral face.

"Oh, that's horrible! Are you staying with some relatives?!" She wanted to know that he wasn't staying alone. "No, I'm on my own. Actually, I was wondering if I could stay for a few nights. I have rupees..." He was interrupted though by Anju saying loudly "Of course, you can stay as long as you want. "In fact, Kafei and I are more than willing to adopt you." She said sweetly. "Oh, thanks." He thanked blushing at her hospitality. Does Link accept her offer of adoption?
121122.title: Forced into them

121123.content:
Unknown to Link, due to his repeated time traveling, there began to be side effects. After his battle on the moon and defeating the Mask he found himself back in Clocktown, with no means of getting home, the way he came in sealed off for some unknown reason. While wandering around Clocktown, trying to think of a way to get home, or what he might have to do in order for the way home to become open, those side effects made themselves known. He immediately felt a dull pain aching from his bladder as he was hit by a sudden urge to urinate. This wasn't just a simple need to pee, no, he had to pee! If he didn't find somewhere to do it soon he'd likely wouldn't have a choice of where to do it.

Link looked around desperately, standing in the middle of Clocktown in front of the clock tower. He looked to his left, the way leading to the Stockpot inn. Then he looked ahead, the exit of town to Termina field. He likely would have time to rethink so he ran.
121123.title: Other

1211231.content: He knew for a fact that they had a bathroom, due to the strange experience he had in there after midnight. He preferred not to think about it. He ran in to the inn. He rushed to the toilet, unfortunately for him, it was occupied. He was trying so hard not wet himself! Did he make it in time?
1211231.title: To the Stockpot inn

12112312.content: Despite Link's efforts, his bladder released itself into his green shorts, the ones he wore under his tunic. He looked down in shame as a puddle formed on the floor, contiunig to grow until his bladder emptied. This was one of the, if not the most, humiliating moment in his life. "Link, is that you?" A suprised voice asked. Who was there
12112312.title: No

121123121.content:
"Hi Anju." Link greeted, swallowing the lump in his throat. "Oh you poor thing, you had an accident didn't you?" She asked rhetorically. "Come on, let's get you into some dry clothes." She guided the wet boy up to an unoccupied room and handed him some dry clothes. "When you're dressed come back downstairs, so I can wash your clothes." She requested sweetly before giving Link some privacy. He nodded in agreement and stripped himself of his wet clothes.

He looked at the clothes in suprise. Particularly the underwear. This was because they were...
121123121.title: Anju

1211231212.content:
To his shock, instead of boxers or even briefs, the underwear provided was a pull up. A light green one with a wetnes indicator shaped like the four giants. It was likely designed to fade when wet. Reluctantly, he slipped the pull up on. At least the clothes that came with it weren't too babyish, they were grey shorts and a green shirt. The shirt was weird however, it was longer than usual and had these weird snaps on the bottom of them. With some effort, he snapped the bottom of the shirt into place over his pull up and pulled the shorts up.

He collected his wet clothes and headed downstairs. "Link, I was talking to Kafei. He and I decided that you are more than welcome to stay here, for as long as you want. But if we do let you stay with us, Clock Town laws demand that we adopt you." Anju said grabbing Link's wet clothes from his arms. "And if you become our son, you'll either be wearing pull ups or diapers for as long as you live here. At least until you can show, that you won't have any more accidents." Kafei continued from where his wife left off.

"What do you say Link? Do you want be our child?" Anju asked calmly. Though inside, Link knew she wanted him to agree. It was obvious that she loved children and wanted one of her own. Link did feel like he had to help her, but he may have to be wearing some sort of padding for goddesses know how long! Finally after mental deliberating he decided to...
1211231212.title: Pull ups

12112312121.content:
Link already knew his choice, before he even realized it. For so many years, he had longed for a mother and a father. He grew up an orphan and an outcast. He had no one to truly be there for him. No one, to guide him, to love him unconditionally, and to simply take care of him. It was rough, but now, those days were behind him.

"I want to be your son!" Link agreed with a happy smile. "That's great, I'm happy, son." Kafei replied pulling him into a warm hug. "Thanks...dad." He thanked, tears welling up in his eyes from happiness. He had never felt more loved than this moment. Anju joined in the hug only seconds after her husband. "I love you, mom, dad." Link proclaimed, holding onto his new parents tightly. "We love you too." Anju replied kissing him on top of his head.
The beautiful moment was interrupted by...
12112312121.title: Agree to the adoption

121123121211.content:
Link didn't want the hug to end. He felt as warm and safe as he had ever in his life. For a second, he thought the warm mass spreading into the back of his pull up was a product of that. It only took him a second to realize what really happened though, he had pooped his pull up. He looked down in shame and fear. He didn't know how his new Mom and Dad would react.

"Did you have an accident?" Kafei asked sympathetically. Link just nodded his head, not trusting his voice. "Alright, let's get you cleaned up." He suggested picking his new son up. "Don't feel bad, you couldn't help it. I promise Anju and I will never get angry at you for having an accident " He comforted gently. He went back to the spare room, grabbing some things from a closet, before lieing Link down a padded mat.

"Just try to lay still for me, buddy."Kafei requested as he slipped Link's shorts off and unbuttoned, what Link now realized was, the onesie. "Okay Dad." He agreed, not wanting to make the inevitable diaper change more uncomfortable. Kafie gently and thouroghly began to wipe Link's bottom. He threw the used pull up in the trash, powdered him, and then...
121123121211.title: Link having an accident

1211231212111.content: He took out a nice fresh diaper. Link was confused, now a diaper, but still, he was being loved and cared, so he decided to let it be. He smiled as the diaper was taped on him. “All done.” Kafei said. He buttoned his shorts back on and hugged his son again. Link smiled as he hugged back, then he went to play. While playing in the living room, he thought about Navi, what was she doing now? Someone then came by and that was...
1211231212111.title: Put a diaper on him

choices: Think I can wear a diaper too?”
12112312121111.content: Link was playing with his toys when he heard “Hello, Link. I’m so glad you are alright.” Link then blushed as he saw his childhood friend, Zelda, smiling at him. Link tried to explain his diaper “Hi...Zelda...Look, it’s not what it looks like...” Zelda gave him a comforting hug smiling and said “It’s alright, Link. It isn’t your fault. Besides, I think you look cute in them!” Link smiled in tears when he heard that and hugged her back. She wiped his tears away and asked “Hey Link...
12112312121111.title: Zelda.

choices: Yes, here, now who to pick?
125.content: Would Life Is Strange cound here, or, should that be put in another section?
125.title: Other

1251.content: Life Is Strange it is, Life will get stranger for someone, but, who do we use here?
1251.title: Yes, here, now who to pick?

choices: Chole wants her to be diapered
Max has a sexually fantasy about diapers
12511.content: Why does max end up diapered
12511.title: Max.

125111.content: Chloe wants her to be diapered, but for what reason?
125111.title: Chloe wants her to be diapered

12512.content: Chloe is diapered due to liking them?
12512.title: Chloe.

13.content: Okay how about these games?
13.title: Strategy

131.content: Now to decide which games. Let's start with the more recent ones
131.title: Fire Emblem

1311.content: Okay which fates character gets diapered?
1311.title: Fates

13111.content: Almost done with the questions. Is this male or female Kana?
13111.title: Kana

131111.content: Okay this is the last question. Why is MALE Kana in diapers?
131111.title: Male

1311111.content:
Kana woke up, wet and freezing. "Again?" He muttered disappointedly. This had been going on since the battle against Anaknos. He was almost 9, he shouldn't be wetting his bed like a baby!

"Kana wake up." His mother called opening the door to his room. "Another accident?" The Nohiran princess asked sympathetically. "Don't tell Uncle Xander or Ryoma about this." He begged tears budding in his eyes. He wanted to be just like his uncles one day, strong and brave. Sure, he really respected his Uncle Takumi and Leo, and he absolutely adored and was adored by his aunts. But, Xander and Ryoma were Kings! He was sure they didn't ever wet their beds like babies.

His thoughts were interrupted by his Mama's voice. "I won't tell them sweetheart, but I doubt they'd care. They'd know you couldn't help it." She assured sweetly. "Go take a bath, I'll set some clothes out for you." She said leaving the room.

He nodded and went to his own private hot spring. He stripped of pee drenched clothes and laid them on the floor before stepping into the bath. He sighed as the hot water soothed his muscles and relaxed his heart. He grabbed a nearby cloth and washed himself with it. A moment later he stepped out of the bath, squeaky clean. He looked at the clothes his Mama put out for him. Instead of his usual armor, it was a pair of comfortable dark brown pants, and a black long sleeved turtle neck. He went to put on his underwear and discovered they were...
1311111.title: He needs them

13111112.content:
To his suprise, his Mama had given him a pair of thick cloth trainers. Thick enough to where they could easily hold one or two wettings! He sighed in disappointment. His Mama didn't trust him to make it to the bathroom! He pouted but slipped the training pants on.

"They're pretty soft at least." He grumbled trying to see some positive to the situation. He pulled on the pants and the shirt followed. He rolled up his sleeves and walked towards his Mama. "Will you play with me today, Mama?" He chirped his bad mood all but forgotten. She replied
13111112.title: Cloth training pants (pull ups)

1313.content: How about Three Houses or one of the older games?
1313.title: Other

choices: No I want a different storyline
Jak(from Jak and Daxter), Cloud(Final Fantasy 7)
Mario(need I say more?), Chrom(fire emblem)
15.content: How 'bout we do a crossover between a couple of games? How about ceartin video game characters end up in a mysterious daycare where they all end up in diapers? If yes, which characters will we use?
15.title: Other

choices: Try to climb out of the crib
151.content:
"Where am I?" Link asked as he slowly got up. He looked around, to his surprise there were bars all around him! He realized quickly he was in a crib. He then noticed that he, and another person, was covered by a large by a soft, light blue, blanket. What was even crazier though, was that he was almost completely naked! The only thing covering him was a thick white diaper with green tapes and a triforce symbol on the front.

He was startled by a noise beside him. "What's going on?" A young man with very spiky brown hair asked. "I dunno, I just woke up here. I'm Link by the way." Link answered and held his hand out to shake. "I'm Sora." The now named Sora replied. He was dressed like Link. Practically naked, except for a diaper.

"Man, I have to pee!" Sora complained squirming. "Try climbing out of this thing." Link suggested gesturing towards the tall bars. "Worst case though...the diapers are pretty thick." He reasoned blushing and gesturing towards his own diaper, which he had wet while he was sleeping. What does Sora do?
151.title: Sora(Kingdom Hearts), Link(Legend of Zelda)

1512.content:
"It's too high!" Sora complained after several attempts to climb the bars. He looked down in shame, knowing he had no other choice now. He relaxed his bladder and allowed a streak of warm pee to enter his diaper. "Good boy, Sora." A man praised, almost sarcastically, entering the oversized nursery.

He's a tall man with long silver hair. "Who're you?!" Link questioned as Sora was too embarrassed to speak. "My name is Sephiroth, but you will refer to me as Daddy." The man spoke cooly. "What do you want from us?" Sora's asked getting the courage to speak.

"I need heirs to succeed me, after I conquer every universe. One of you will be the next ruler, and the other will be his second in command." He explained with an arrogant smirk. "Why'd you choose us?" Link questioned suspiciously. "Because, you both are the greatest or one of the greatest warriors in your respective universes." He replied rolling his eyes a little.

"Why are we wearing diapers?!" Sora suddenly burst out. Sephiroth merely chuckled. "I'm going to be a good father and a good father takes care of his children. Now then, it's time to change your diapers." He picked both boys up easily and lied Sora on the changing table. Did Sora resist the diaper change?
1512.title: Wet his diaper

152.content: How about this fine selection of choices?
152.title: No I want a different storyline

info.brief_description: Your favorite video game characters in diapers
info.description: Please keep all posts fairly long. Try to keep sexual stuff to a minimum. Also don't write anything EXTREMLY gory. For example, you can say someone died and how they died, but please don't go into too vivid detail. Pretty much anything else besides that goes though!
